patthana16.66:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.66:4.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana16.66:4.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.66:4.6: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.66:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
